caption.p: The amount of oil, seed weight and oil content in transgenic seeds overexpressing the KS domain. a The amount of oil per seed in the T2 seeds of overexpression lines; b the seed weight of the transgenic lines; c seed oil content of the transgenic lines. WT wild type, KS/ kasI kasI mutant complementation line, OE overexpression lines. Values are reported as the means of 10 biological replicates along with standard deviation. The means with the same letters are not statistically significantly different. Statistical analysis of the results was conducted using the one-way analysis of variance ( P < 0.05)
